name: Algo++
title: Algo++: Courses on Data Structures & Algorithms in Delhi | Coding Blocks

metas.name: description
metas.content: Summer courses on Algorithms & Advanced Data Structures at Coding Blocks Delhi & other centers. Don't miss this course If you're planning for internships or interviews.

openGraph.title: Algo++ Advanced DS & Algorithms Course by Coding Blocks
openGraph.description: Introducing our newest courses on Data Structures and Algorithms starting this 2 June - 15 July. The course will all important data structures and algorithmic knowledge required for interviews.

courseMeta.title: Master Algo++
courseMeta.description: Master Data Structures and Algorithms in C++. Crack Coding Interviews

aboutMentor.name: Mosina Ashraf
aboutMentor.summary: Mosina Ashraf is a versatile coder and has an innate understanding of the concepts which makes her way of teaching almost like learning through osmosis. She is a competative programmer and a front end Web developer. Apart from having an excellent academic record, with her sense of innovation, she has contributed in creating great teaching content. Known for her euphonious voice, warmhearted nature and coding skills she blends proficiently as a great mentor.

highlights.head: Opportunities unlocked for learner
highlights.description: Budding programmers will be equipped with expertise in Data Structures and Algorithms.Excel all your programming interviews by developing an efficient approach to find optimized solutions.Get well-versed with Advanced Topics like OOP(s), Complexity Analysis, etc. for Interviews.Become an expert in problem solving by practicing questions based on Sorting, Searching, Greedy Algorithms, Divide and Conquer Algorithms etc.Get placed at companies like Amazon, Google, Uber etc.

highlights.head: Hands on Projects and Problems:
highlights.description: Build real-world applications like Tic Tac Toe, Sudoku, Tower of Hanoi.N-Queen & N-Kings Solve using Bitmasking.Splitwise Cash Flow using a Graph Algorithm

highlights.head: Why choose CB Live:
highlights.description: Two-Way Interaction: Share screen with your mentor for any doubt resolution 24*7.Placement Support: From Interview recommendations to placement, we are there for you at every step.Get into Bigwigs: Our expert will help you crack interviews for Amazon, Microsoft, Apple, Google, and Facebook.

highlights.head: This course is essential for you:
highlights.description: Someone who loves solving real world problems and wants to create a solution.

studentsSay.name: Anshul Mittal
studentsSay.story: Coding Blocks helped in gaining enough experience to get internships at giants like Google and Rubrik.

studentsSay.name: Sidharth Bansal
studentsSay.story: Hii I am Sidharth Bansal from Delhi technology university. I have done competitive boot camp from coding blocks. This gave me a great exposure to problem solving mindset.

studentsSay.name: Samarth Jain
studentsSay.story: My journey in the world of Competitive Programming started with the Bootcamp at Coding Blocks, which turned out to be a changing point in my life. The immense amount of knowledge I got during the course did not only develop my interest but also made me pursue this field later. A special thanks to Shubham bhaiya, Mayank bhaiya and Prateek bhaiya for being the guiding lights in my journey and always motivating us to follow our passion!

schedule.description: Interview preparation and Competitive Programming sessions
Tips on building resumes, Profile Building and Future Career Guidance
